name: scenario
comment: # selection of the scenario setup

name: nSteps
comment: # number of simulation steps

name: burnIn
comment: # number of burn in time steps

name: ioSteps
comment: # number of steps after when the IO writen to file: 0=off

name: burnInTimeFactor
comment: # time scaling in burnIn

name: omniscientBurnIn
comment: # number of omiscient agent time steps

name: connRadius
comment: # radius within which location cell get connected

name: minFriends
comment: # min number of friends per person

name: maxFriends
comment: # max number of friends per person

name: memoryTime
comment: # number of time steps for which observations remain saved

name: utilObsError
comment: # observation error to compare utilities

name: mobNewPeriod
comment: # period within a choice is new and not challenged

name: randomCarPropDeviationSTD
comment: # individual random deviation of car properities

name: innoPriority
comment: # weight of priority of innovation [0 0.5]

name: individualPrio
comment: # individual random component of priorities

name: innoWeigPrice
comment: # innoWeigEmmisions = 1 - innoWeigPrice [0 1]

name: innoDevRange
comment: # extend of the area within the innovation distribution

name: radicality
comment: # exponent of the preferences -> high values lead to extreme differences

name: util
comment: # [cobb ces]

name: weightConnections
comment: # flag if connections to friends are weighted

name: reductionFactor
comment: # population reduction factor

name: selfTrust
comment: # how much more a agent values this own opinion
